panels.description: $Cluster: Number of entries per region in descending order. Displays up to top 15 regions.

panels.description: $Cluster: CPU of the member that has the higest CPU load
panels.title: Max System CPU Load (Aggregate)

panels.description: $Cluster: Free, used, and max heap. For sustained performance, used heap should be below 80% of max heap
panels.title: Heap: Used, Free, Max (Aggregate)

panels.title: Used Heap (Aggregate)

panels.description: $Cluster: Physical memory of the member with the highest value
panels.title: Max Physical Memory (Aggregate)

panels.description: $Cluster: Sum of all member threads
panels.title: Thread Count (Aggregate)

panels.description: $Cluster: Sum of all member committed heap memories
panels.title: Committed Memory (Aggregate)

panels.description: $Cluster: Sum of all member owned entry memory costs
panels.title: Memory Maps (Aggregate)

panels.description: $Cluster: Sum of all member free swap space sizes
panels.title: Total Swap Space (Aggregate)

panels.description: $Cluster: Open filed descriptor count of the member with the highest value
panels.title: Max File Descriptors (Aggregate)
